title: Treebank Publications
subtitle: davidc's new or updated treebanks. Initially a repository for tragedy treebanks adapted for use with standoff metrical data.

collections.title: Verse Treebanks
collections.text: The template for this treebank publication is maintained by the Perseids Project.

sections.notes: Mambrini's work updated with all crasis divided, extra attributes added to give full forms for words altered by crasis, elision etc; minor corrections to relations and postags.
